project.description: Run the dashboard part of the Geppetto test suite on a private build, running on your own server.

org.jvnet.jenkins.plugins.nodelabelparam.name: SiteLabel
org.jvnet.jenkins.plugins.nodelabelparam.description:
One of "cambourne", "cambridge", "santa-clara", or "redmond".
Make sure that this matches the PrivateBuildURL parameter above! If you get this wrong, then you will end up streaming VM images from one site to another, and the build will time out.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: Server
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: It assumes single host deployment, and connects to that Use ssh-upload-jenkins-keys from root@openstack-jenkins.uk.xensource.com to allow remote login.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: ImageId
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: The image id to use when launching the instance.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: InstanceId
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: The instance id you expect it will be created.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: NetworkAddress
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: The network address you expect the instance is going to get.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: PublicNetwork
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: The network (bridge or name-label) the guest instances sit on.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: NetworkingMode
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Networkmode can be flat, flatdhcp, vlan, flatdhcpha
